Uses of Interface
org.codehaus.preon.CodecFactory

Packages that use CodecFactory
org.codehaus.preon The package providing the API allowing you to construct your own Codecs, and to extend the way Codecs are constructed. 
org.codehaus.preon.codec The package providing some default CodecFactories, supporting a number of different Codecs. 
 

Uses of CodecFactory in org.codehaus.preon
 

Classes in org.codehaus.preon that implement CodecFactory
 class DefaultCodecFactory
          The default CodecFactory implementation, constructing Codecs based on all CodecFactories available by default.
 

Methods in org.codehaus.preon with parameters of type CodecFactory
<T> Codec<T>
DefaultCodecFactory.create(AnnotatedElement metadata, Class<T> type, CodecFactory[] addOnFactories, CodecDecorator[] addOnDecorators, BindingDecorator[] bindingDecorators)
           
static
<T> Codec<T>
Codecs.create(Class<T> type, CodecFactory... factories)
          Creates a Codec for the given type, accepting an number of CodecFactories to be taken into account while constructing the Codec.
static
<T> Codec<T>
Codecs.create(Class<T> type, CodecFactory[] factories, CodecDecorator[] decorators)
          Creates a Codec for the given type, accepting an number of CodecDecorators to be taken into account while constructing the Codec.
static
<T> Codec<T>

Uses of CodecFactory in org.codehaus.preon.codec
 

Classes in org.codehaus.preon.codec that implement CodecFactory
 class ArrayCodecFactory
          A CodecFactory that will be triggered by Bound or BoundList annotations on arrays.
 class BooleanCodecFactory
          A CodecFactory capable of creating Codecs that deal with booleans.
 class BoundBufferCodecFactory
           
 class CachingCodecFactory
          An implementation of the CodecFactory interface that will prevent the same Codec from being constructed twice.
 class CompoundCodecFactory
          A CodecFactory capable of generating Codecs by delegating to a sorted list of other CodecFactories.
static class EnumCodec.Factory
          A CodecFactory creating Codecs capable of decoding enum values.
 class ExplicitCodecFactory
          A CodecFactory allowing you to explicitly set the Codec to use.
 class ListCodecFactory
          A CodecFactory capable of supporting Lists.
 class MapCodecFactory
           
static class NumericCodec.Factory
          A CodecFactory generating Codecs capable of decoding numbers from the BitBuffer.
 class ObjectCodecFactory
          The CodecFactory for ObjectCodecs.
 class StringCodecFactory
          A CodecFactory generating Codecs capable of generating String from BitBuffer content.
 

Methods in org.codehaus.preon.codec with parameters of type CodecFactory
 void CompoundCodecFactory.add(CodecFactory factory)
           
 void CompoundCodecFactory.remove(CodecFactory factory)
           
 

Constructors in org.codehaus.preon.codec with parameters of type CodecFactory
ArrayCodecFactory(CodecFactory delegate)
          Constructs a new instance, accepting the CodecFactory creating the Codecs that will reconstruct elements in the List.
CachingCodecFactory(CodecFactory delegate)
          Constructs a new instance, accepting the CodecFactory to which this factory should delegate if it not already constructed the required Codec before.
CachingCodecFactory(CodecFactory delegate, CodecConstructionListener listener)
           
ListCodecFactory(CodecFactory delegate)
          Constructs a new instance, accepting the CodecFactory creating the Codecs that will reconstruct elements in the List.
MapCodecFactory(CodecFactory codecFactory)
           
ObjectCodecFactory(CodecFactory codecFactory)
          Constructs a new instance, using a default mechanism for constructing Binding instances.
ObjectCodecFactory(CodecFactory codecFactory, BindingFactory bindingFactory)
          Constructs a new instance.
SelectFromCodec(Class<?> type, Choices choices, ResolverContext context, CodecFactory factory, AnnotatedElement metadata)
          Constructs a new instance, accepting the type, choices, a ResolverContext to wrap for introducing the prefix variable, the CodecFactory to delegate to, and the metadata.
